entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:35 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
